posts.post_content:
Selling a decent example of a Kbats and a superb tintype


The tintype I believe is from the 1870s and is incredible. Condition and image are amazing. 

The Kbats is a bit rough, but a tough set and a decent image. 


Tintype is $700 obo
Kbats $600 obo


Would consider trading for n172s

Thanks
Travis
